thread.title: The Rev. Al Sharpton to visit family of Corey Jones
thread.title_full: The Rev. Al Sharpton to visit family of Corey Jones - NY Daily News

author: NEW YORK DAILY NEWS
title: The Rev. Al Sharpton to visit family of Corey Jones
text:
JB NICHOLAS/JB NICHOLAS for the NY Daily New The Rev. Al Sharpton said he would visit the family of Corey Jones "in a matter of days," at their request. The Rev. Al Sharpton plans to visit the family of a Florida church musician who was shot and killed by a police officer over the weekend, he announced Thursday.
Sharpton said in a statement he will meet with the grieving relatives of Corey Jones “in a matter of days” at their request, but would not attend a protest outside the Palm Beach Gardens police department Thursday morning.
Courtesy family of Corey Jones Florida police shot and kill beloved church musician Corey Jones after his car broke down. Sharpton called the early details about the controversial case “disturbing and troubling.”
Facebook Palm Beach Gardens Police Officer Nouman Raja, 38, fatally shot Jones. Jones, 31, was shot by Officer Nouman Raja early Sunday morning after the cop approached Jones’ broken-down car, believing it to be abandoned. Police said Tuesday Jones was armed with a gun, which he purchased just three days before his death. His family said Jones probably did not know Raja was a police officer, because he was not in uniform and driving an unmarked car.
jsilverstein@nydailynews.com
Related Stories Florida police get death threats over musician's shooting
